wobani.component.audio

Class AudioListenerComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • wobani.core.Component
      • wobani.component.audio.AudioListenerComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentBase, Invalidatable

    public class AudioListenerComponent
extends Component
    The scene's audio listener and it's position, orientation and velocity affects how we hear audio sources' sounds.
